reviewText: First let me say the boxes are the only thing that is in spanish, the movies themselves are all english.  All three DVDs are the unrated softcore editions.  These movies are excellent for this genre in every way possible,  The stories are nice, the women are beautiful, and the acting is decent.  But first and foremost these movies are about sex.  Each movie contains both girl/girl and boy/girl scenes, and there are a lot of explicit below the waist shots which is what makes it for us.  This is a worthwhile purchase.
